hasMenuItem.name: C13. Yam Roll, Kappa Maki, Inari (2 Pcs), Miso Soup

hasMenuItem.name: Teriyaki Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: A Japanese sauce crafted with soy sauce, sugar, and mirin, offering a harmonious blend of sweet and savory notes, ideal for glazing or dipping.

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Mayo
hasMenuItem.description: A creamy blend of mayonnaise and spices, offering a bold kick to complement Japanese dishes.

hasMenuItem.name: Wasabi
hasMenuItem.description: A traditional Japanese condiment, typically including a sharp, pungent flavor derived from the grated wasabi root, often accompanying sushi.

hasMenuItem.name: House Spicy Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: A unique blend of spices creates this house spicy sauce, offering a robust and tantalizing addition to enhance any dish with its distinct heat.

hasMenuItem.name: Tempura Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: A savory Japanese dipping sauce, traditionally made with a soy-based blend, offering a sweet and salty balance, ideal for complementing tempura dishes.

hasMenuItem.name: Ginger
hasMenuItem.description: Ginger sauce typically includes fresh ginger, garlic, and a blend of spices, serving as a versatile condiment for enhancing various dishes.

hasMenuItem.name: Sriracha Spicy Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: A hot sauce made from chili peppers, vinegar, garlic, sugar, and salt, offering a balanced blend of heat and tanginess.

hasMenuItem.name: 5. Gyoza
hasMenuItem.description: Meat. Pan-fried dumpling.

hasMenuItem.name: 6. Chicken Kara-Age
hasMenuItem.description: Deep fried marinated chicken wings. 6pcs

hasMenuItem.name: 1. Miso Soup
hasMenuItem.description: A savory broth with miso paste, garnished with green onions.

hasMenuItem.name: 4. Edamame
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh soy beans.

hasMenuItem.name: 7. Appetizer Tempura
hasMenuItem.description: 2 pc. ​prawns & 4 pc. vegetables.

hasMenuItem.name: 2. Goma-Ahe Spinach
hasMenuItem.description: With sesame sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: 11. Large Miso
hasMenuItem.description: Miso soup, a traditional Japanese appetizer, typically includes a savory blend of miso paste, tofu, wakame seaweed, and scallions in a dashi broth.

hasMenuItem.name: 10. Medium Miso
hasMenuItem.description: Miso soup with tofu, seaweed, and green onions, typically based on a dashi broth.

hasMenuItem.name: 1. Rice
hasMenuItem.description: Steamed Japanese rice, typically includes a sprinkle of sesame seeds for added flavor and texture.

review.reviewBody: The Bento Box B is a good deal. Lots of good stuff at a very reasonable price. The teriyaki sauce and the tempura were particularly good.
1. Miso Soup is always hot and delicious. 95. Chicken / Beef Teriyaki Roll wow so tasty.
Ayaz was perfect door dashing delivery! Highly recommend this restaurant
5. Gyoza 96. Dynamite Roll and 1. Miso Soup all taste delicious and were packaged very well.
Always made well. Very tasty sushi. Highly recommend the 5. Gyoza and C5. Dynamite Roll, California  Roll, Kappa Maki, Miso Soup
